Articles.Content:
I'm reviving the old NovaPunch mod, and some of the parts are in deep need of retexturing.  I am hoping that someone would be willing to put in a little time to do this.  If needed, I may have the original files for the parts, but would have to pull them out of an archive of the entire mod's assets.

This zip file:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/wxchlw5a97ftv08/NP_parts_NeedingRetexturing.zip?dl=1

has 14 parts in it which seem to be the worst (aka oldest) needing retexturing

I believe that some of them share textures.  The NovaPunch folder goes into the GameData directory, all the files I included are in their correct locations.

Some of the parts share textures:

The two decouplers seem to be the same except resized

In the FuelTanks, the NP_K1_Stages, appear to have two textures duplicated, if so, then you only need to do one.
